## Excel
>- Is easy
>- Is fairly quick (the first time)
>- Isn't free but it might be cheap
>- Is difficult to make 'reproducible'

## R
>- Isn't easy (but you can learn it)
>- Is very quick the 2nd & 3rd & 4th & 5th... times
>- Is free
>- Is easy to make 'reproducible'
